comments.raw_text: On Mac, Firefox forces the user to save PDF files to a folder before they can be viewed. This has annoyed me ever since I moved to Mac since on Windows I could have them open directly without having to save them. Often I just want to take a quick look at a PDF and don't want to save it (explicitly) to my hard drive.
comments.creator: jwatt@jwatt.org
